Class ExoScene

java.lang.Object
ExoScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
RopewayScene
public abstract class ExoScene
extends java.lang.Object
3D scene for training.

      Gets the position at next animation step.

      Returns:
      the animation status: on if true, off otherwise.
